definitions.definition: To emit electromagnetic radiation , especially visible light, when absorbing radiation of some other wavelength .
To cause to fluoresce; to make fluorescent .
Of colours, to be very bright ; to be so bright as to appear to radiate as a light source.

main_definition: ( intransitive , physics ) To emit electromagnetic radiation , especially visible light, when absorbing radiation of some other wavelength .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , physics ) To cause to fluoresce; to make fluorescent .
( intransitive ) Of colours, to be very bright ; to be so bright as to appear to radiate as a light source.
